title: Sold Beautiful T202 Mcgraw Bresnahan ft/fs
author: Econteachert205

posts.post_title: Sold Beautiful T202 Mcgraw Bresnahan ft/fs
posts.post_content:
Here is a beautiful T202 in really nice shape.  The only creases are tiny ad right next to the fold lines  sold dollars obo or would do as part of a deal for my trade interests.  I have a few other singles for sale in the 50's-60's as well. paypal f/f preferred

Trade interests:
Bird/magic rookie
Jordan/Barkley star basketball cards 84-86
Kobe/ Lebron rookie

Could you add some pictures of the creases?  Potentially interest but would like to see the creases better.

Thanks and happy new year!

Dan
This is the best I can show them,  they are very small diagonal creases on the top border coming off the fold line.
